term_trace.Requirement: Functional Requirement{"name": "AUV Autonomy"; "gid": "FR-001"; "description": "The AUV shall operate autonomously for at least 8 hours."}.
Functional Requirement{"name": "Visual Mapping"; "gid": "FR-002"; "description": "The AUV shall be equipped with a visual mapping system."}.
Functional Requirement{"name": "Light Intervention"; "gid": "FR-003"; "description": "The AUV shall conduct light intervention tasks such as cathodic protection surveys."}.
Functional Requirement{"name": "Complex Intervention"; "gid": "FR-004"; "description": "The AUV shall have the potential to move to more complex interventions such as valve turning."}.
{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD1", "id": "SD1", "description": "The AUV system is developed as a Module named \"AUV_Module\".", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD2", "id": "SD2", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Robotic Platform named \"AUV_Platform\", it should use the Interfaces \"Sensors\" and \"Actuators\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD2", "id": "SD2", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Robotic Platform named \"AUV_Platform\", it should use the Interfaces \"Sensors\" and \"Actuators\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD2", "id": "SD2", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Robotic Platform named \"AUV_Platform\", it should use the Interfaces \"Sensors\" and \"Actuators\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD3", "id": "SD3", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"AUV_Operator\", it should use the Interface \"Inputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD3", "id": "SD3", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"AUV_Operator\", it should use the Interface \"Inputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD4", "id": "SD4", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"LRE_Ctrl\" (for Last Response Engine), it should use the Interfaces \"Inputs\" and \"Outputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD4", "id": "SD4", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"LRE_Ctrl\" (for Last Response Engine), it should use the Interfaces \"Inputs\" and \"Outputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD4", "id": "SD4", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"LRE_Ctrl\" (for Last Response Engine), it should use the Interfaces \"Inputs\" and \"Outputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD5", "id": "SD5", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"AUV_Autopilot\", it should use the Interface \"Outputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "SD5", "id": "SD5", "description": "\"AUV_Module\" should contain a Controller named \"AUV_Autopilot\", it should use the Interface \"Outputs\" (defined by \"AUV_Module\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "PT1", "id": "PT1", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Primitive Type named \"nat\" (for natural numbers).", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "PT2", "id": "PT2", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Primitive Type named \"int\" (for integers).", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "PT3", "id": "PT3", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Primitive Type named \"string\" (for string values).", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "PT4", "id": "PT4", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Primitive Type named \"boolean\" (for boolean values).", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "PT5", "id": "PT5", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Primitive Type named \"real\" (for real numbers).", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}

{"kind": "Non-Functional Requirement", "name": "CT1", "id": "CT1", "description": "The \"AUV_Module\" should define a Composite Type named \"SVec\" (Spherical Vector), to record values such as \"radial\" (of type \"real\"), \"polar\" (of type \"real\"), and \"azimuth\" (of type \"real\").", "priority": "6", "types": ["architecture"]}
